channel.title: Fallen Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Fallen Village" - Auto-accept turned on, looking to blow

item.title: Fallen Village
item.content:encoded:
So we've got everything we need for the Impossible Mission, except enough villagers.

Anyone who hasn't got Surivived the Impossible should come join us.

The village has all upgrades up to Tier Two, including ROOT and Pizzawitch access.

While we're waiting to fill up, we have a daily patrol raffle for 10RP and 2 TACOs between everyone who patrolled the previous day. We also have regular Kaiju fights.
